files.description: Regression tests ensuring qg_bench.cli can be imported without syntax errors and exposes the expected entrypoints.
Regression tests invoking the CLI (module and/or console-script) via subprocess to verify it starts, prints help, and exits successfully.
Regression tests importing src.experiments.toy_isin* modules to ensure they are syntactically valid and importable.
GitHub Actions workflow running lint-free installation and pytest on push/pull_request to require CI to pass before merging.

missionDescription: Reproduce failures locally, fix syntax_error in qg_bench/cli.py and src/experiments/toy_isin*, add regression tests covering CLI import/run, and require CI to pass before merging.
missionSuccessCriteria: Complete strategic task identified by Meta-Coordinator or escalated by Strategic Tracker
